context.p: If users need to change the Activation Code, please follow below steps.

step.cmd: Contact your TXOne sales representative for changing Activation Code.
After you receive the new Activation Code, go to Administration License , and click Specify Activation Code button.
Input the new Activation Code and click Save.
Click Renew License to update your product license.

note.p: It is required to click Renew License button for StellarOne console to connect with TXOne Product License Server.

step.cmd: A message with Licenses have been updated successfully appears. As a result, the Last Updated item now shows the date and time the license was updated.
